mapper.sql: id, variable_id AS variableId, element_id AS elementId, element_name AS elementName, collection_name AS collectionName, sign_type AS signType, remark, is_del AS isDel, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,c.undertake_status AS undertakeStatus FROM t_bpm_variable_multiplayer a LEFT JOIN t_bpm_variable b ON a.`variable_id` = b.`id` LEFT JOIN `t_bpm_variable_multiplayer_personnel` c ON a.id = c.variable_multiplayer_id WHERE a.`element_id` = #{elementId} AND b.`process_num` = #{processNum}
mapper.sql: select ${selectfield1} from t_bpm_variable tbv left join t_bpm_variable_single tbvs on tbvs.variable_id=tbv.id where tbv.process_num=#{processNum} and tbvs.${wherefield}=#{whereValue} and tbvs.assignee_name is not null union all select ${selectfield2} from t_bpm_variable tbv left join t_bpm_variable_multiplayer tbvm on tbvm.variable_id=tbv.id left join t_bpm_variable_multiplayer_personnel tbvmp on tbvmp.variable_multiplayer_id=tbvm.id where tbv.process_num=#{processNum} and tbvm.${wherefield}=#{whereValue} and tbvmp.assignee_name is not null
